result.purpose: Responsible for handling turnstile verification challenges and related models.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to turnstile verification in separate files for clients and models.

internal/infras/turnstile/client.go.purpose: Client for verifying turnstile challenges using a specified configuration.

internal/infras/turnstile/models.go.purpose: Defines models for handling turnstile verification requests and responses.
